page.title: 04THE NEW PILOTS CLUB
page.content: Pilots is the name of a club for children.Pilots began in Mr.and Mrs. Brandwood's extension.When it started there were only 10 people in it.My sister was one of those people.It increased up to 35 people.They go on camps,walks and play games.Now it is held in a church in Wakefield called Zion.When you join Pilots you get a badge and a book.One Sunday you go out to the front and say a promise.In your book you have to do things like help people and read parts from the Bible.Sometimes you get a badge to say you have done it.The first test is to read from the Bible.Its starts at 6:00 pm to 8:00 pm or 9:00 pm for people over 11 years old.I really have enjoyed going to Pilots.
